overview: Here we are midway between the sexual awakenings of springtime and the hot passion of summer. And caught in between, the Sex Troopers are having a wild and steamy time of it. No, this is not a military group. They are that large group of young men — handsome, athletically muscular, hung and horny — who "troop" together in twos and threes to have hot bareback sex.
title: Sex Troopers
